meta.article_title: June 17, 2013 - Shadow Practice for Strokes and Footwork

shadow_practice_for_strokes_and_footwork.probleme: Improve sharpness and steadiness of shots

debutant.description: Practice forehand drives fifty to a hundred times, stroking each time (either all forehand or alternate forehand and backhand).
Practice backhand drives fifty to a hundred times, stroking each time (either all backhand or alternate forehand and backhand).
Practice side-to-side footwork fifty to a hundred times, stroking each time (either all forehand or alternate forehand and backhand).

intermediaire.description: Practice powerful forehand loops, from both the wide forehand and wide backhand, as well as from the middle, and practice moving from one spot to another.
Practice powerful backhand loops, from both the wide backhand and wide forehand, as well as from the middle, and practice moving from one spot to another.

avance.description: Practice random footwork, imagining specific opponents and playing out rallies with different movements and shots.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice receive techniques, imagining an opponent's serve and returning it with different shots.
